segments.text: I would like to know is it a direct flight to Dubai ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . No . You need to transfer to a connect flight in the middle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Too bad . I hate transferring during a flight . It is too complex .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to do it . But it takes only about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? It used to cost a few hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has become more time saving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Good . I want two side by side tickets in the Economy cabinet . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
